list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a loose granular substance, typically pale yellowish brown, resulting from the erosion of siliceous and other rocks and forming a major constituent of beaches, riverbeds, the seabed, and deserts.
smooth or polish with sandpaper or a mechanical sander.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: sand the rusty areas until you expose bare metal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cát các khu vực gỉ lại cho đến khi bạn lộ kim loại trần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sprinkle or overlay with sand, to give better purchase on a surface.
